name: Mouse tactical squad builder
description:
🐭🐭🐭🐭 The goal is to get the four mice across to the right side of the map, before the ten turns are up. The mice can throw each other and build bridges by forming certain formations, similar to how flanking in a tactical squad combat gives you a bonus.

🔇The game has no sound.

This was an entry for Ludum Dare 51 in the Extra category.
